TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptReferenceEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当呈现时的脚本引用时，对象包含中定义的对象实例。When a script reference is rendered, the object contains the object that is defined in the instance. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件检查对象，并根据需要进行修改。You can create an event handler for the event to check the object and modify it as needed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示引用名为 CustomScript.js 的脚本文件的 ASP.NET 网页。The following example shows an ASP.NET Web page that references a script file that is named CustomScript.js. 当 Web 应用程序承载在 www.contoso.com 域中，[ScriptReference.Path]属性设置为值特定于该域。When the Web application is hosted on the www.contoso.com domain, the [ScriptReference.Path] property is set to a value specific for that domain. 事件处理程序事件检查主机 URL 和的值更改 [ScriptReference.Path]属性，如有必要。An event handler for the event checks the host URL and changes the value for the [ScriptReference.Path] property if it is necessary. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: A object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Script As ScriptReference
public: property System::Web::UI::ScriptReference ^ Script { System::Web::UI::ScriptReference ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含脚本库的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that contains the script library.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含在网页上引用的客户端脚本。

span.span: A object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象在属性添加到属性时引发事件。The object in the property is added to the property when the event is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示引用名为 CustomScript.js 的脚本文件的 ASP.NET 网页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET Web page that references a script file that is named CustomScript.js. 当 Web 应用程序承载在 www.contoso.com 域中，[ScriptReference.Path]属性设置为值特定于该域。When the Web application is hosted on the www.contoso.com domain, the [ScriptReference.Path] property is set to a value specific for that domain. 事件处理程序事件检查主机 URL 和的值更改 [ScriptReference.Path]属性，如有必要。An event handler for the event checks the host URL and changes the value for the [ScriptReference.Path] property if it is necessary. 对象检索通过属性。The object is retrieved through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs/VB/Default.aspx#1)]
